books.name: Pride and Prejudice
books.description: A romantic novel of manners that depicts the British Regency era.

books.name: Moby Dick
books.description: The narrative of Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to seek revenge on Moby Dick, the white whale.

books.name: Frankenstein
books.description: A novel about a scientist who creates a grotesque creature in an unorthodox scientific experiment.

books.name: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
books.description: A collection of twelve short stories featuring the famous detective Sherlock Holmes.

books.name: A Tale of Two Cities
books.description: A story set in London and Paris before and during the French Revolution.

books.name: The Catcher in the Rye
books.description: A story about the events in the life of a young man named Holden Caulfield.
A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the future.

books.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality.

books.name: The Great Gatsby
books.description: A novel about the American dream and the roaring twenties.

books.name: Brave New World
books.description: A dystopian novel about a technologically advanced future society.
